name: Florian Rival
bio: Florian Rival is a software engineer at Google. He is the author of GDevelop, an open-source game making software based on WebAssembly and JavaScript. He also made Lil BUBâ€™s Hello Earth, an 8-bit game starring the internet sensation cat, available on desktop and mobile, 100% made with GDevelop. More generally, he is fond of innovative approaches to push the limits of what we can do in apps, mobile apps and games.
